channel.title: Invisible Glitch
channel.description:
When people teleport to wildy they become invisible?
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2jaap8p.jpg[/img]
If you tele home and tele back you can see them
Anyone know how i can fix this problem?
Thanks, Elux

item.title: Invisible Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[quote=“Owner A Raffo, post:4, topic:221493”]try

     case 51031: //Pking
        if(teleblock == true){ 
           sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
        } else {
        teleportToX = 3067;
        teleportToY = 3954;
        }
        break;[/quote]

Difference being ?
You changed co ords by around 2… thats going to do nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

try

     case 51031: //Pking
        if(teleblock == true){ 
           sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
        } else {
        teleportToX = 3067;
        teleportToY = 3954;
        }
        break;

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

		case 51031: //Pking
			if(teleblock == true){ 
				sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
			} else {
			teleportToX = 3065;
			teleportToY = 3951;
			}
			break;

Thats my teleport case i had a height level added before that was no difference.

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible Glitch
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

hmm, Are there any calls to a character appearance update, or anything like that, when you teleport?

Because if not, it may be a problem with your Stream, (packets broke somewhere… which can be really hard to fix)

Read full topic
